title: Posted a blog on Web Development Basic Building Blocks - Check it and have a read.
summary: This blog covers the essential building blocks of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It explains how these technologies come together to form the backbone of modern web applications.

title: Posted a blog about Docker - Understand Containers and Virtualization
summary: This blog provides an in-depth explanation of Docker, containers, and how Docker simplifies the process of developing, shipping, and running applications. It compares Docker with traditional virtualization methods.

title: Posted a blog about Regression - Understanding Linear, Multi-Linear, and Logistic Regression
summary: This blog provides a comprehensive guide to regression techniques, including simple linear, multi-linear, and logistic regression. It explains the mathematics behind these models and how they are used in machine learning.

title: Understanding Multi Linear Regression: Concepts, Mathematics, and Applications
summary: This blog delves into Multi Linear Regression, covering its mathematical formulation, matrix representation, derivation, and proof techniques. It also explains the significance of the least squares method in predictive modeling.
